# Social Bot Scheduler

A multi-language integration laboratory demonstrating interoperability between Python, Go, Node.js, and PHP using n8n as the central orchestration bus.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This is an educational lab. Read the [COMPLIANCE.md](docs/COMPLIANCE.md) before use.

## Core Features
- **Zero-Touch Setup**: Automagic infrastructure and workflow configuration.
- **Multi-Axis Matrix**: 8 integration cases covering 8 different language combinations.
- **Production Hardening**: Container security (Trivy), input validation (HUB CLI), and K8s hardening.
- **Observability (v3.0)**: Integrated Prometheus, Grafana, and cAdvisor stack.
- **Guardrails**: 100% coverage for Retries, DLQ, Idempotency, and Circuit Breaker.

## Tech Stack
- **Orchestration**: [n8n](https://n8n.io) (v2.7.5)
- **Languages**: Python, Go, Node.js, PHP, Rust, Ruby, C#, FastAPI, Flask, Laravel, Symfony, React.
- **Infrastructure**: Docker Compose, Kubernetes.
- **Monitoring**: Prometheus, Grafana.

## Operational Commands
- `make up`: Start the entire infrastructure.
- `python hub.py listar-casos`: List available integration cases.
- `python hub.py doctor`: Run system health checks.
- `python hub.py ejecutar <case-id>`: Run a specific bot emisor.
